name: Dual Core MCU project
description: Create a project for dual-core MCUs targeting both cores (e.g., Cortex-M7/M4).
files_included:
**CMakeLists.txt:** Build setup for top-level and each core.
**main.c:** Entry files for each core.
**Linker scripts:** Memory maps for both cores.
outputs:
**.hex:** Binary for each core.
**merged.hex:** Combined image for flashing.
